sentences.sContent: "A whole nation of belligerent, snappish people?"asked Nikolai.
sentences.sContent_eng: "A whole nation of belligerent, snappish people?"asked Nikolai.
sentences.sCn: “整个国家都是好战暴躁的人民？” 尼古拉不敢相信。

sentences.sContent: I said his heaven would be only half alive; and he said mine would be drunk: I said I should fall asleep in his; and he said he could not breathe in mine, and began to grow very snappish.
sentences.sContent_eng: I said his heaven would be only half alive; and he said mine would be drunk: I said I should fall asleep in his; and he said he could not breathe in mine, and began to grow very snappish.
sentences.sCn: 我说他的天堂是半死不活的；他说我的天堂是发酒疯；我说我在他的天堂里一定要睡着的；他说他在我的天堂里就要喘不过气来，于是他开始变得非常暴躁。

remMethod.val: snap(劈啪声， 折断) ＋ pish → 脾气暴躁的

words.tran: 厉声说话的；生气勃勃的；时髦的；爽快的
咬；厉声说；咯嗒一声关上
突然折断，拉断；猛咬；啪地关上
